data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
The word وَإِنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كُنَّا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: Try, prove or test by good or evilTo become old and worn out, wear and tear, withered, decayedNot caring, minding, heeding, regarding or paying attentionConferring favors, benefits or blessingsSwearing oaths, covenantsInforming, acquainting, revealing, manifesting, making apparent, evident, clear or plainCompeting, striving or hastening
data.sentence: The word لَمُبْتَلِينَ comes from the root ب ل و and is associated with the meanings: Try, prove or test by good or evilTo become old and worn out, wear and tear, withered, decayedNot caring, minding, heeding, regarding or paying attentionConferring favors, benefits or blessingsSwearing oaths, covenantsInforming, acquainting, revealing, manifesting, making apparent, evident, clear or plainCompeting, striving or hastening
